title: Prohibits landlords convicted of housing violations from claiming exemptions, credits or itemized deductions for such property on state tax returns
summary: Prohibits landlords convicted of housing violations from claiming exemptions, credits or itemized deductions for such property on state tax returns.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to prohibiting landlords convicted of housing violations from claiming exemptions, credits or itemized deductions related to such rental property on state tax returns
